ygData.subject: Race Wars Server
ygData.msgSnippet: They re testing the code for the race wars server now on the test server.  I m wondering how people think it will be?  I was kind of interested in race wars,
ygData.messageBody:
They're testing the code for the race wars server now on the test server. I'm wondering how people think it will be? I was kind of interested in race wars, since is was an unusual form of PvP. I've never really been interested in killing other players, but having the possibility available changes the dynamic of the game, and that is interesting.

However, I'm worried based on what I've heard on the test server that race wars is just going to be a bloodbath. The fact that you can't kill your own team is perhaps giving people the extra motivation to kill people on other teams for no reason other than the fact that they can.

Anyone else have any thoughts on this one?

- Christina
